title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 930/87 of 31 March 1987 fixing for the 1987 marketing year the reference prices for cherries
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 930/87
of 31 March 1987
fixing for the 1987 marketing year the reference prices for cherries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1987 marketing year, the reference prices for cherries falling within subheading 08.07 C of the Common Customs Tariff, expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net, of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
May (21 to 31): 137,61
June: 122,95
July: 112,92
August (1 to 10): 86,67

This Regulation shall enter into force on 21 May 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 March 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
